thread.section_title: Avis marchands de dmlights | Avis - dmlights | www.dmlights.com
thread.title: Vassiliki Field

author: Vassiliki Field
title: Vassiliki Field
text:
Very good communication by email. They initially had only 3 of the 5 lamps we wanted, so we were told they were going to order the other 2, and that could take up to about a week or more. They would send the order all together as soon as they had them. We were surprised (and pleased) to receive the complete order in France a couple of days later.
We have not installed the lamps yet, but hopefully there should be no problem as they arrived well packaged.
